answer: The corpus used for the task is the diachronic corpus pair from BIBREF0: DTA18 and DTA19, which are subparts of the DTA corpus BIBREF11. These corpora are freely available lemmatized, POS-tagged, and spelling-normalized diachronic corpora of German containing texts from the 16th to the 20th century. DTA18 contains 26 million sentences published between 1750-1799 and DTA19 contains 40 million sentences published between 1850-1899.
